title: Sonoma
name: Buena Vista Winery
content: This is the oldest winery in Sonoma, established by Count Agoston Haraszthy in 1857, and it's a national historical landmark. There is a tasting fee for wine. You can also call ahead and pay extra ($20-$90) for special tours of the facility, and even blend your own wine in the caves. Take a car or bike to get here.
